title: Parent-Child Relationship Get
description: How to get a parent-child relationship.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<gedcomx xmlns="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <relationship type="http://gedcomx.org/ParentChild" id="FPPPX-PP0">
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" rel="child" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP1" rel="father" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP1" rel="parent" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP1" rel="person1" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" rel="person2" title="Conclusions"/>
        <identifier type="http://familysearch.org/v1/ChildAndParentsRelationship">https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPPX-PP0</identifier>
        <person1 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP1" resourceId="PPPX-PP1"/>
        <person2 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" resourceId="PPPX-PP3"/>
    </relationship>
    <relationship type="http://gedcomx.org/ParentChild" id="MPPPX-PP0">
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" rel="child" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP2" rel="mother" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP2" rel="parent" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP2" rel="person1" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" rel="person2" title="Conclusions"/>
        <identifier type="http://familysearch.org/v1/ChildAndParentsRelationship">https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPPX-PP0</identifier>
        <person1 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP2" resourceId="PPPX-PP2"/>
        <person2 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" resourceId="PPPX-PP3"/>
    </relationship>
</gedcomx>
